title: Basics
description: This section exposes the basic opertions of string, array, and characters that can be usefull to solve some problems.

title: ArrayList
description: A collection of elements that are stored in continous memory.

title: Stack
description: An elements are inserted in stacking order , and an elements are removed from the top (LIFO).

title: Queue
description: A Queue behave likes a normal queue, an elements are inserted in similar fashion and the elements that are inserted first will be removed first (FIFO).

title: Deque
description: A Deque behave as a combination of Stack and Queue (LIFO & FIFO).

title: PriorityQueue
description: An elements are ordered based on their natural ordering.

title: HashMap
description: A HashMap takes a key and value. To retrive the value we have to use the key.

title: HashSet
description: A HashSet contains only unique values.

title: TreeMap
description: A map which inserts elements based on elements natural ordering. (Ordered Map)
